basics.name: Alistair Grenyer
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.tagline: Building elegant solutions to complex problems
basics.summary: I'm a passionate software engineer with experience developing web applications and backend systems. I specialize in Python and JavaScript technologies with a focus on React and Next.js. With strong experience in both frontend and backend development, I create robust and scalable solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences.
basics.personalNote: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and contributing to open-source projects. I have a background in Aerospace Engineering and bring analytical problem-solving skills to software development.

highlights: Worked on multiple small to large projects using a range of technologies
Used databases including MySQL, MariaDB, Neo4j, MongoDB
Developed with C#, Java and Python
Focused on TDD and OOP methodologies
Created extensive unit tests, emulation and simulation for testing embedded systems
Used project management tools including JIRA, Bitbucket, SVN and Bamboo
Developed React web apps and Python FastAPI RESTful APIs
Worked with cloud architecture including AWS EC2 and AWS Lambda, Heroku
Implemented self-hosting with Coolify and Docker for scalability
